entry.title: Elevate 38 Sports Turf for Batting Cages (5mm Pad)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 2.69

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Elevate 38 sports turf with 5mm foam pad is made for batting cages and moderate traffic areas and continues to deliver a long term returns on investment at a moderate price point. It provides an excellent feel, durable 1/2" pile height and spring set yarn delivers traffic pattern resistance.

The foam backing offers additional padding and extends the life of the sports turf; as well as provides impact resistance for plyometric activities.

How to Order
  • Buy Pre-Cut Sizes online, Request a Quote for custom lengths, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • Kodiak Elevate 38 rolls are 12' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot, but can be custom made in 15' with minimum order requirements.
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

     

    Please allow 2.5 weeks for delivery to most areas of the lower 48 states.

entry.title: 23" x 23" x 8mm Strong Interlocking Rubber Tiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 9.99 - 10.99 (3 variants)

5/16" (8mm) Interlocking Rubber Flooring Overview:

8 mm (5/16") Interlocking Rubber Floor Tiles are 23" x 23" x 8mm and are the most commonly applied thickness in commercial and residential gyms. Withstands general use and moderate vertical impact.

No glue required as the interlocking system is a loose lay product and is easily installed by a weekend warrior.

Each tile has 1" overlap on each interlock. Use the calculator feature to determine the necessary number of tiles. Call for questions or specifications.

Rubber Tile Specifications:

  • Tile Size: 23" x 23" x 5/16" (8mm)
  • Loss Per Interlock: 1" per tile (2 Tiles = 5'10")
  • Cutting Method: CNC Waterjet
  • Grade: Residential & Light Commercial
  • Warranty: 5-Year Defect

Typical Rubber Applications:

Fitness Centers, Physical Therapy Clinics, Chiropractic Clinics, Pet Training centers, Residential gyms, Laundry Rooms, Aisles, and Walkways.

entry.title: 3' x 3' x 1/2" Everlock Commercial Grade Interlocking Tiles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type:
Price: 37.99 - 139.99 (21 variants)

3/8" (9.5mm) Kodiak Everlock Interlocking Rubber Tiles

Kodiak Everlock are the number one commercial tile for fitness centers and areas customer's need a beautiful tile with low odor and a very tight interlocking tile system.  The seams are almost invisible when interlocked and the commercial density creates a beautiful floor that is durable and easy to clean.

1/2" Thick rubber tiles are a common thickness used in heavy impact commercial fitness centers with general activities and moderate to higher vertical impact on the floor.

** Extremely high impact areas should use the Hammerlock line of vulcanized tiles available in 1/2" and 3/4" thick.

No glue is required for installation as the tiles are a loose lay product and can be installed easily by a weekend warrior.

The tiles are 3' x 3' x 1/2" with a 1" overlap on each interlock.  Use the calculator feature to help determine the total number of necessary tiles. Call for questions or specifications.

Rubber Tile Specifications:

  • Tile Size: 3' x 3' x 1/2"
  • Loss Per Interlock: 1" per tile (2 Tiles = 5'10")
  • Cutting Method: CNC Waterjet
  • Grade: Commercial
  • Warranty: 5 Years

Typical Rubber Applications:

Commercial Fitness Studios, High School & University Fitness Centers, Cross Fit, Physical Therapy Clinics, Chiropractic Clinics, Pet Training centers, Residential gyms, Basements, Garage

entry.title: 5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Dual Shock High Impact Commercial Grade Rolled Rubber Flooring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 4.39 - 5.99 (18 variants)

5/16" Kodiak Dual Shock High Impact Rubber Flooring Overview:

5/16" Kodiak Dual-Shock High Impact Rolled Rubber Flooring was designed for high impact and features a dynamic force reduction of 35%..

The Dual Shock impact rubber is a higher end rubber flooring system used in commercial and higher end fitness spaces where cushioning joints, plyometric impacts and weight impacts is required.

The top wear layer of 3mm provides high color options and a cleanable surface; while the 5mm shock pad layer deadens the impact and cushions joints. 

All rolls are 4' wide and custom length to nearest 1' increment

Typical application: High School & Collegiate Weight Rooms, Locker Rooms, Fitness Centers, Physical Therapy Clinics, Home Gyms, Laundry Rooms, Chiropractic Clinics

Specifications:

Thickness: 8mm (5mm shock layer, 3mm top layer)
Width: 4' Wide
Roll Length: 15 - 75' (1' increments only)

Shipping Time

Ship: Lead time to ship is typically 3-4 weeks.

Call with questions or special requests.  Sometimes we can work something out if you are flexible on color, thickness, etc.

Installation Video

entry.title: 5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Confetti Color Regrind Rolled Rubber Flooring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 99.00 - 496.00 (16 variants)

5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Regrind Rolled Rubber Flooring

5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Regrind Rolled Rubber Flooring is a common thickness used in home gyms, commercial fitness centers and other physical fitness centers that have low to moderate vertical impact.

What is Regrind Rubber?

Regrind rubber is produced from the scraps of the 1st quality production runs; therefore you do NOT get to choose the colors in the mix.  The color blend will vary with lot/run each week.  By ordering you acknowledge the colors in the regrind mix are random.  Regrind rubber is typically slightly less dense than normal commercial grade material.

Typical applications: Fitness Centers, Physical Therapy Clinics, Chiropractic Clinics, Pet training centers, Home Gyms, Laundry Rooms, Aisles, Walkways

** Orders put in without specific roll cuts will be shipped in 4' x 50' Rolls by default with the remaining balance on the last roll.

Regrind Notes:

Confetti regrind is a MIX of RANDOM colors from scraps. The colors are not a selection.

Specifications:

Width: 4' Wide
Thickness: 5/16" (8mm)
Minimum Length: 15' (all rolls have to be at least 15' long, smaller cuts will be combined)
Max Length: Up to 275'
Cut: To specification (to the nearest 1' foot increment)t)

Shipping Time
Color Regrind Rolls - Ships within 7-8 business days and and delivers in approx 2.5 - 3 weeks.  It is popular item due to price point and supply is limited due to nature of regrind.


Call with question or special requests.

Installation Video

entry.title: Vinyl Bonded Foam Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 0.00

Carpet bonded foam is used for most martial arts, gymnastics, fitness, wrestling and training studios along with trampoline air parks.  The foam flooring can be used for other high impact areas for dance, martial arts, and even as wall padding.

Vinyl bonded crosslinked polyethylene foam with vinyl top layer is available in 2 thicknesses.

Kodiak vinyl bonded foam is designed with flexible/slit backing.

Vinyl bonded foam is available in the standard Polyethylene.

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 6'W x 42'
  • Standard PE rolls are available in 1-3/8” and 2″ thicknesses.

Kodiak also manufactures vault runways, as well as sizes of practice mats of different sizes.

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Light Gray, Purple, Red, and Yellow

Custom Sizes:

Custom size vinyl bonded rolls are not offered at this time.

entry.title: Velcro For Carpet Bonded Foam 4"W x 42'L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 44.99

Kodiak sells Velcro for carpet bonded foam is sold in 4"W x 42'L Rolls.

The 4"W Velcro holds the carpet bonded foam rolls together by joining the face fiber on the rolls.

The 4" hook/width is also ideal for simulating a floor balance beam. Velcro can be used to mark zones on the floor or separate areas with different colors.

The Velcro hook will only stick to carpet bonded foam NOT to Flex Floor Ex carpet. 

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 4"W x 42'L

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Charcoal, Green, Light Gray, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, and Teal.

Custom Sizes:

Not available at this time, all Velcro rolls are 42'L

entry.title: Carpet Bonded Foam Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 0.00

Carpet bonded foam is used for most gymnastic, cheerleading studios along with trampoline air parks.  The foam flooring can be used for other high impact areas for dance, martial arts, and even as wall padding.

Kodiak Carpet bonded foam is available in solid/flat backing or the flex/slit backing.

Carpet bonded foam is available in the standard Polyethylene, EVA foam option is also available.

What's the difference? EVA foam is considered a premium foam. It’s slightly softer and more flexible. There is presumed to be some additional rebound and shock absorption as well.

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 6'W x 42'
  • Standard PE rolls are available in 1-3/8” and 2″ thicknesses.
  • EVA backed rolls are available in 1-1/2″ and 2″ thicknesses. 

Kodiak also manufactures vault runways, as well as sizes of practice mats of different sizes.

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Charcoal, Green, Light Gray, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, and Teal.

Velcro

Rolls come with velcro to join. You get 1 velcro strip per seam.
IE: Order 1 Roll, no velcro. Order 2 rolls, you get 1 strip of velcro. Order 4 rolls, you get 3 strips of velcro.

Custom Sizes:

Custom size carpet bonded foam rolls are available with a longer lead time(4 weeks)
Max Width: 78"
Max Length: 90'

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 2.5" Thick Combo Foam
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 189.99 - 499.99 (90 variants)

The 2.5" Thick combo one layer of Extra-firm bonded foam to one layer of the Flex-firm foam; which is slightly softer This provides a semi-soft cushioning with a firm landing and stable shock absorption for medium impact activities. The extra firm layer prevents bottoming out from impact.

It is softer/more cushioning than the medium firm mats; and will be less stable for static activities/exercises. Your feet will sink into the mat and it is not for high impact activity.  Great for home exercise activity and general fitness applications.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Martial Arts
  • Beginner and Intermediate Gymnastics
  • Home Workouts

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable

The extra firm mats provide impact cushion; but stability on ankles, joints and wrists.

entry.title: 5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Commercial Grade Rolled Rubber Flooring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 1.89 - 7.79 (12 variants)

5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Rubber Flooring Overview:

5/16" (8mm) Kodiak Rolled Rubber Flooring is a common thickness used in residential and some commercial gyms with basic activities and little vertical impact on the floor. Rolls are 4' in width and cut to the nearest foot in length.

Applications include: High School Weight Rooms, Locker Rooms, Fitness Centers, Physical Therapy Clinics, Home Gyms, Baseball Dugouts, Laundry Rooms, Chiropractic Clinics, Pet Training Centers, Aisles, Walkways.

** Orders put in without specific roll cuts will be shipped in 4' x 50' Rolls by default with the remaining balance on the last roll.

Specifications:

Width: 4' Wide
Minimum Length: 15' (all rolls have to be at least 15' long, smaller cuts will be combined)
Max Length: Up to 280'
Cut: To specification (to the nearest 1' foot increment)

Shipping Time

Fast Ship Colors: Black, Blue Speckle (10%), Gray Speckle (10%), Tan Speckle (10%), Brick Red Speckle (10%)
Fast Ship Time: Ships within 5 business days, delivers in approx 2 weeks. Holiday orders may take slightly longer.

All Other Ship Time: Other colors are not fast ship available. Ships within 15 business days, delivers in under 4 weeks.

Call with questions or special requests.  Sometimes we can work something out if you are flexible on color, thickness, etc.


Installation Video

entry.title: 12'L x 3/8" Thick Kodiak Rubber Flooring Reducer Strip
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 69.99

12'L x 3/8" Thick Rubber Flooring Reducer Strip

The Kodiak Rubber Flooring reducer is 12'L strip, 3/8" Thick and 2.5" wide on the top ramp side.  It is design for NON-ADA compliant use/areas.

Each section is 12' Long and can be glued to the ground with standard urethane adhesive or liquid nails.

The reducer strip can angle slightly to fit rubber ranging from 5/16" (8mm) - 1/2" (12mm) thick, although it is designed for 3/8".

Shipping Time:

Items usually ship in 3-5 days depending on color.

s:variant.title: Solid Black

entry.title: Hybrid Performance Sports Turf (5mm Pad) - KS48MF-5mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 4.09

Artificial Turf Description

Kodiak Sports manufactures a set of special hybrid sports turfs that combine nylon and polyethylene fibers for an unbeatable combo of durability and softness. Durability and softness are not capable of being combined at cheaper fiber levels; typically a soft turf fiber is going to show a lot of traffic patterns.

The KS48MF is ultra soft blend of PolyE yarns. A perfect fit for fitness centers with a lot of ground work.

Our hybrid athletic turfs are perfect for clients looking for softer feel that is very durable in an advanced performance environment involving extensive ground work and traffic. The 48 ounce hybrid athletic turf is designed for moderate traffic areas including speed/agility training, cross fit, yoga, and more.  The KS48MF is very popular in the fitness industry.

These products are designated with the KS740MF, KS48MF, KS755MF, KS755EMF product designations.

The KS48MF-5mm is the high middle tier of the hybrid sports turf offered at an excellent price point with solid resistance to traffic patterns and abrasion. It is the most versatile turf and can be used for almost any indoor sports facility training.

How to Order
  • Buy online, Request a Quote, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • The KS48MF Turf Rolls are 15' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

    The KS48MF hybrid sports turf is one of our most popular items and is produced weekly. 

    Single and smaller roll orders can ship with in 3 days.

    Small orders of 2000-6000 sq. ft. will typically ship within 7-9 days

    Please allow 2.5 - 3 weeks for delivery of larger orders.

s:variant.title: Green / 15' Wide

entry.title: Hybrid Performance Sports Turf (5mm Pad) - KS755EMF-5mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Athletic Textiles
Type:
Price: 4.89

Artificial Turf Description

Custom Product - 10,000 sq. ft. minimum order.  Extended blade version of KS755MF, same turf, longer blade configuration for soccer.  For Smaller orders, order KS755MF (no minimum)

Kodiak Sports manufactures a set of special hybrid sports turfs that combine nylon and polyethylene fibers for an unbeatable combo of durability and softness. Durability and softness are not capable of being combined at cheaper fiber levels; typically a soft turf fiber is going to show a lot of traffic patterns.

Our hybrid athletic turfs are perfect for clients looking for softer feel that is very durable in an advanced performance environment involving extensive ground work and traffic. The 55 ounce hybrid athletic turf is designed for heavy traffic areas including soccer, football, speed/agility training, cross fit, yoga, and more.  The KS755EMF is very popular in the fitness,batting cage and soccer industry.

These products are designated with the KS740MF, KS48MF, KS755MF, KS755EMF product designations.

The KS755EMF-5mm is the heavy duty top end hybrid sports turf offered at an excellent price point with solid resistance to traffic patterns and abrasion. It is the most versatile turf and can be used for almost any indoor sports facility training.

How to Order
  • Buy online, Request a Quote, or call to place your order with a sales person
  • Synthetic Turf is priced by the square foot
  • The KS755 Turf Rolls are 12' or 15' in width and cut to incrementally in length to the nearest foot
  • Minimum Order: 20' length (Shorter orders will not be accepted without calling in for authorization)
    Installation Options

    Kodiak Sports Installs Nationwide or we provide material for DIY

    Installation options

    • Full glue down
    • Seam only glue down
    • Seam only glue/seam tape
    • Factory Velcro seams
    Shipping Time

    The KS755EMF hybrid sports turf a custom production product only.  It is the extended blade version of KS755MF.  Same face weight, tufted to make the blades length longer for a more plush feeling.

    Single and smaller roll orders can ship with in 3 days.

    Minimum Order 10,000 sq. ft., allow 3-5 weeks for delivery of custom orders.
